Name: id
Description: An identifier variable that uniquely identifies each response

Name: submission_date
Description: Timestamp that determines when the data was received

Name: business_dist
Description: District of residence of the business

Name: business_type
Description: Type of business

Name: business_yrs_in_operation
Description: How long business has been in operation for?

Name: how_lng_covid_dsrupt_last
Description: How much longer do you expect the disruption due to COVID-19 to last?

Name: revenue_gen_21_v_19
Description: Compared to 2019, how much revenues does your business expect to earn in 2021?

Name: wrkfrc_size_chng_21_v_19
Description: Compared to 2019, what percentage of workforce will your business employ in 2021?

Name: rcvry_diffclty_winning_tourist_confidence
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that winning the confidence of tourists and guests in the context of COVID-19 will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_understanding_source_markets
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that understanding and meeting the demands of source markets (source markets are foreign or domestic places from where the tourists arrive) will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_ensuring_tourist_health_saftey
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that ensuring health and safety measures for the guests and tourists will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_ensuring_workers_health_saftey
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that ensuring health and safety measures for the workforce will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_goods_shortage
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that shortage of goods, supplies / input materials will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_human_resource_shortage
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that shortage of human resource will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_cash_flow_shortage
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that shortage of cash flow will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: rcvry_diffclty_additional_fund_shortage
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks that shortage of additional loans or funds will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: other_rcvry_diffclty
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent thinks any other issues will be one of their biggest difficulties in 2021.

Name: most_significant_rcvry_difficulty
Description: We also asked businesses to rank order their choices for the above multi-select question. This column captures what each respondent chose as their first option.

Name: biggest_support_rcvry
Description: Who do you think will be the biggest support for your business in 2021?

Name: perm_stopped_not_started_new_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent haven't started any other businesses.

Name: perm_stopped_started_new_trsm_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent have started a new business in the tourism sector

Name: perm_stopped_started_new_non_trsm_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent have started a new business in a non-tourism sector.

Name: perm_stopped_will_retrn_to_trsm_business
Description: Do you intend to return to the tourism business in the future?

Name: perm_stopped_started_hotel_accommodation_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent has started new tourism business in " Hotel and accommodation" sub-sector
